new.title: Your skin</br> Your beauty
new.text: 100% natural plant ingredients that effectively moisturize,</br> saturate,</br> prevent damage

important.title: What is important to us
important.info1: We use 93% organic certified ingredients that do not harm your health or the environment. Each product undergoes rigorous safety testing at the Oxford Bioscience Lab in England.
important.info2: The formula of Niveni Cosmetics is developed taking into account the individual needs of your skin. Twice a week you can take advantage of a free online consultation, where we will answer all your questions and help you create your personal daily skin care program.
important.info3: Effective protection of your skin starts with the effective protection of the cosmetics you apply to it. Dark purple Miron Glass bottles protect the fragile components of cosmetics and preserve their nutritional properties and durability. No extra packaging, no extra waste.

team.title: Niveni Dream Team
team.info: Every girl is unique. However, we are similar in a million little things. Niveni looks for these little things and creates beautiful things that emphasize the advantages of every girl.

shop.title: Shop
shop.discountText: There are no discounts for this category!

idea.title: Idea and woman
idea.text:
I have always been fascinated and inspired by the healing powers of Nature. She is the most skillful creator of beauty and, accordingly, has the best means to maintain it. My interest in plant alchemy and the search for harmless effective beauty methods led me to create Niveni Cosmetics. I studied herbology and perfected the art of creating natural skin care products. 100% meets my high requirements. Niveni Cosmetics is the wisdom of nature embodied in exclusive care for your skin.

Emma Karapetyan, Founder of Niveni Cosmetics

magic.title: The magic is in the details
magic.text:
Effective skin care doesn't have to be complicated. Therefore, we have developed a daily program for you, based on simplicity and the most harmonious combination of products. These three steps to the health and beauty of your skin will take you no more than 45 seconds a day:

⦁Cleansing

⦁Moisturizing

⦁Deep nourishment

Our line includes hydrating, nourishing and protecting products for every skin type and for your individual needs.

To make you always unique.
